mapper.select: SELECT tb.iboard, tb.title, tu.iuser, tb.regdt, tu.uid AS writerNm, tu.profileimg FROM t_board tb LEFT JOIN t_user tu on tu.iuser = tb.iuser ORDER BY tb.iboard DESC
SELECT tb.title, tb.regdt, tb.iuser, tb.iboard, tb.ctnt, tb.viewcnt, tu.unm AS writerNm, tu.profileImg FROM t_board AS tb LEFT JOIN t_user tu on tu.iuser = tb.iuser WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.insert: /* 인서트한 후 바로 iboard 를 매개변수객체의 멤버필드에 담아줌 */ INSERT INTO t_board (title, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (#{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board WHERE iboard = #{iboard} AND iuser = #{iuser}
